title: Growth Quiz 8

questions.text: What growth goal can I best support you in right now?
How do I best show support for your ambitions?
choices: Giving you time and space to pursue them
Making sacrifices to help you succeed

questions.text: What can I do to help you grow without pushing too hard?
choices: Ask how I can help instead of directing

questions.text: How do we balance supporting each other's individual growth?
choices: Taking turns prioritizing each person's goals
Finding goals we can work on together
Regular check-ins about what each person needs

questions.text: What's most important about supporting each other's dreams?
choices: Staying committed even when it's hard

description: Explore how you navigate life transitions together.
